titles.title: An original resolution authorizing supplemental expenditures for the Committee on Armed Services.

calendar.text: Committee on Armed Services ordered to be reported an original measure.

action.text: Committee on Armed Services. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Nunn. With written report No. 100-209.
Referred to the Committee on Rules.

calendar.text: Committee on Rules. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Rules. Reported to Senate by Senator Ford without amendment. With written report No. 100-223.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 444.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Yea-Nay Vote. 64-22. Record Vote No: 417.

bill.summary: 10/28/1987--Introduced. Amends Senate Resolution 80, 100th Congress, to increase the authorized expenditures of the Committee on Armed Services.
